metadata.title: CVE-2017-10661 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Race condition in fs/timerfd.c in the Linux kernel before 4.10.15 allowslocal users to gain privileges or cause a denial of service (listcorruption or use-after-free) via simultaneous file-descriptor operationsthat leverage improper might_cancel queueing.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-10661` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.13.0-1005-raspi2 - 4.13.0-1005.5
No subscription required
